attributes.name: Defiler of the Damned
attributes.description: "The corrupted defile all that they touch, through any means necessary."
attributes.parsed_description: "The corrupted defile all that they touch, through any means necessary."

attributes.name: Demise of the Depths
attributes.description: "The deep places of the world play host to foul and wicked creatures, beings who must be purged from Aeternum.
attributes.parsed_description: "The deep places of the world play host to foul and wicked creatures, beings who must be purged from Aeternum.

attributes.name: Demise of the Fae
attributes.description: "The fae were culled from this land when the first humans arrived. Cut down with swords and axes, they stood no chance."
attributes.parsed_description: "The fae were culled from this land when the first humans arrived. Cut down with swords and axes, they stood no chance."

attributes.name: Demon's Bane
attributes.description: "Whatever comes from the corrupted portals shall be met with a quick swing of my hammer."
attributes.parsed_description: "Whatever comes from the corrupted portals shall be met with a quick swing of my hammer."

attributes.name: Denier's Wall
attributes.description: "It was long believed that no one could breach Denier's Wall once it was in place."
attributes.parsed_description: "It was long believed that no one could breach Denier's Wall once it was in place."

attributes.name: Depleted Ritual Staff
attributes.description: "Nearly all of the azoth has been drained from this once powerful staff. What remains is enough for a spell or two."
attributes.parsed_description: "Nearly all of the azoth has been drained from this once powerful staff. What remains is enough for a spell or two."
